Class UserController

java.lang.Object
it.unisannio.ingsof20_21.group8.Care.Spring.UserController
@CrossOrigin("*")
@RestController
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/user/get/all") public java.lang.Iterable<UserDAO> getAllUsers()
      this method gets all the users in the database
      Returns:
      an iterable of Users request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/get/all

    • getUserByEmail

      @GetMapping("/user/get/email/{email}") public UserDAO getUserByEmail​(@PathVariable java.lang.String email)
      this method is used to get the user having the provided email
      Parameters:
      email - used to search the user
      Returns:
      the user having the provided email request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/get/email/dtarver6@simplemachines.org

    • getUserByUsername

      Parameters:
      username - the provided username to search the user
      Returns:
      the user having the provided username request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/get/username/dedland7

    • getUserByRole

      @GetMapping("/user/get/role/{role}") public java.lang.Iterable<UserDAO> getUserByRole​(@PathVariable java.lang.String role)
      Parameters:
      role - the provided role the user must have
      Returns:
      all the users having the provided role request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/get/role/Administrator

    • getUserCreatedBetween

      @GetMapping("user/get/created/{firstdate}/{seconddate}") public java.lang.Iterable<UserDAO> getUserCreatedBetween​(@PathVariable long firstdate, @PathVariable long seconddate)
      Parameters:
      firstdate - the starting date
      seconddate - the ending date
      Returns:
      all the users created between the first and second date request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/get/created/1624217670000/1624995270000

    • getUserReport

      @GetMapping("user/report") public UserReport getUserReport()
      Returns:
      the report example: HTTP request: 127.0.0.1:8087/user/report Output: { "total": 1000, "activeUsers": 482, "loggedLast24Hours": 2, "administrators": 482, "storeManagers": 322, "officers": 340, "deactivatedUsers": 518 }

      this method is used to update the user attempts
      Parameters:
      attempts - the number of new attempts
      username - the user to update

    • updateUserByID

      @PostMapping("/user/update") public UserDAO updateUserByID​(@RequestBody UserDAO newuser)
      this method is used to update an entire user with a new one
      Parameters:
      newuser - the all new user
      Returns:
      the updated user update user * username, temppass -> password, email, ruolo, login attempts, activeuser

      username - the username used to search the user to delete
      Returns:

    • getUserFromToken

      @GetMapping("/user/get/username/token/{token}/{username}") private UserDAO getUserFromToken​(@PathVariable java.lang.String token, @PathVariable java.lang.String username) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, UserException
      this method is used to get the user only if the provided token belongs to the user
      Parameters:
      token - the user token
      username - the user username
      Returns:
      the UserDAO
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the token is wrong
      UserException - if the token does not belong to the user

    • setUserPasswords

      @PatchMapping("/user/setPasswords") public org.json.simple.JSONObject setUserPasswords()
      this method is very dangerous! it should be deleted from the final version.
